title: Silent Protest in Negombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A group in Negombo engagef in a silent protest on Sunday (3) over the current situation in the country.
In the meantime, curfew is currently in effect nationwide until Monday (4) 6 AM.
Public Emergency & Curfew imposed for Public Security – Govt Info Dept
‘Blanket closure of social media is NOT permissible’ – SL Human Rights Chief
ICTA Chairman resigns hours after social media ban in Sri Lanka
